record.dc:title: MF15 Freel's Farm Site 7AN22, Anderson County, Tennessee. Mound 1. Cleared mound floor, Plate 126A. [Feature 1, a circular arrangement of limestone on the floor of the mound].
record.wpa:narrative: Depression in center 6' E.W. x 5' N.S. about 17" deep. Burial 17 under central depression.
record.wpa:comments: No record on file for this photograph. Record on file for photograph 22-659 [fhm00126]. See also photograph 22-659 [fhm00126].
